strings.Value: "I heard that somewhere, in other lands, there live kobolds with golden scales."
"Gold, blue, red... who cares? They are all the same: little gutless beasts!"
"Golden kobolds? Could they be distant relatives of golden dragons? What do you think?"

"You know, just because you heard it in a song... you know... You can't trust all the bards, Ekun. Some of us get carried away and just say whatever sounds good. But of course I myself always mind what I write!"
"The miracles they recount in distant lands... The farther the land is, the more amazing its wonders!"
"The miracles they recount in distant lands... The farther the land is, the more amazing its wonders!"
